output.name: Rhino Script Editor
output.description: A script that enables running Python scripts using Anaconda environments within Rhino 8, including automatic package installation and integration with compas_wood joinery functions.
featureList: Install Python packages via requirements directive
Automatic addition of conda environment paths to sys.path
Dynamic loading of .pyd and DLL dependencies
Execution of scripts within Rhino environment
